page.title: 12FACILITIES FOR YOUNG PEOPLE
page.content: YOUNG PEOPLE COMPLAIN HERE AS EVERYWHERE ELSE, THAT THERE IS NOTHING FOR THEM TO DO. THEY SAY IT HERE WITH SOME JUSTIFICATION. FOR SMALL KIDS, THERE ARE BEAVERS, CUBS AND SCOUTS, GIRLS BRIGADE, BROWNIES AND GIRL GUIDES.A PLAY GROUP AND MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUPS ALSO MEET. A YOUTH CLUB STARTED IN 1982 AND MEETS ON WEDNESDAYS ONLY. IT HAS JUST ACQUIRED A HUT OF ITS OWN,AND HOPES TO MEET MORE OFTEN. THERE IS A CARNIVAL WEEK EVERY YEAR, WHICH RAISES MONEY FOR LOCAL CHARITIES. THERE IS NO DISCO, OR CAFE IN THE BLOCK AND NO BUS SERVICES AT NIGHT. THE NEAREST CINEMA IS IN PLYMOUTH, AS IS THE NEAREST THEATRE. DANCE, GYM AND JUDO CLASSES ETC. ALL TAKE PLACE OUTSIDE THE BLOCK.
